game.name: Fishing Planet
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Sports, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Remote Play on TV
game.shortDescription: Fishing Planet® is a free-to-play and highly realistic first-person online multiplayer fishing simulator. Developed by avid fishing enthusiasts to bring you the full thrill of actual angling on your PC.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fishing Planet® is a free-to-play and highly realistic first-person online multiplayer fishing simulator. Developed by avid fishing enthusiasts to bring you the full thrill of actual angling on your PC.

reviewHighlights.text: Fishing Planet ultimately feels like a very shallow fishing experience. The core issue is how predictable and scripted the fishing becomes. Fish opera...
